name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 12, family members of the victims of the Nantong bus accident came to the scene to burn paper

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 12, Taiyuan, Shanxi. A report on the internet said that an examiner helped students with sports specialties change their scores at a middle school entrance exam. Parents of students at the scene said that parents were not allowed to enter the examination room, and the children made a scene after the exam. Later, they called the police, and the police from the police station came but did not give any explanation. The staff of the Education Bureau responded that the school would handle any problems, and that we should not listen to hearsay, and the official information should prevail.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 12, Changrong Street, Chengdu. It was reported online that a young man had an argument with an old lady in a jeep because he touched it. The old lady demanded compensation of 10,000 yuan from the young man and beat him, while shouting that her son was the mayor, which caused controversy.
The incident lasted from the afternoon to late at night. During this period, the police came to protect the jeep and controlled the young man, which caused public dissatisfaction. The people at the scene surrounded the police car and the jeep and demanded that the young man be released.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 13, the police reported that the information circulated online was untrue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: Taiyuan No. 29 Middle School said that the information about cheating in physical examinations was false

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 13, Guangzhou citizens who were dissatisfied with the rising water prices went to a representative's restaurant and left a bad review on Meituan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Starting today, Douyin will restrict advertising to content and bloggers in the fields of current affairs, finance, law, and medicine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 13, Hangzhou Binjiang District Longhu, unfinished building rights protection

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Academic Northern Myanmar"
On May 12, it was reported online that Song Kai, a UBC PhD student introduced by Nanjing Forestry University in 2019, was demoted and had his salary reduced by the school because he failed the assessment, and part of his resettlement fee and housing subsidy were returned, which led to his suicide on April 2 at the age of 38.
On the afternoon of May 13, regarding the suicide of young teacher Song Kai, the Propaganda Department of the Party Committee of Nanjing Forestry University responded to reporters that the reason for suicide reported online was not true.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The location is downstairs of Ping An Financial Center in Shangcheng District
